entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
